partial.description: Partial work working toward or under a larger fix/feature (will not trigger a release)
partial.title: Partial Work

pr-feedback.description: Updates done due to PR feedback
pr-feedback.title: PR Feedback

refactor.description: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature (code formatting as well)
refactor.title: Code Refactoring

test.description: Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests
test.title: Tests

chore.description: Build system, non src code changes
chore.title: Chore
